entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
